text: Hey <@U014JRZ096U>, has this been resolved? I think I know what the issue is.

Hi all! I'm trying to build a module that reads the meeting data of a contact. Initially I thought accessing the engagements/meetings API with a serverless function but I now learned that I have to use a private app instead. But, a private app gets no access to meeting data, is that right?

Hi everybody,

i want to build the trigger for pop-up forms in statamic ( php / vue cms )
and i can't find some information of the "visitor information and behavior" in the api.
i need the url's to:

• segmented lists
• visitor ( is it a contact or not )
• CTA clicked
• days since last visit
• session count
• pages visited
• referral url
alternatively, i would like to load the popup information via api, but the support informed me that this is currently not installed. That's why we want to rebuild the trigger to be able to use the functions now
